lines.gurmukhi: srvr mY n jwnI dwdr kml giq miRg miRgmd giq AMqr n jwnI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Saravar Mai N Jaanee Daadar Kamal Gati , Mrig Mrigamad Gati Antar N Jaanee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: A frog living in a pool is unaware of the presence of a lotus flower growing in the same pool. Even a deer is unaware of the musk pod that he is carrying within his body.

lines.gurmukhi: min mihmw n jwnI Aih ibKR ibKm kY swgr mY sMK iniD hIn bk bwnI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Mani Mahimaa N Jaanee Ahi Bikhr Bikham Kai , Saagar Mai Sankh Nidhi Heen Bak Baanee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a poisonous snake because of its poison is not aware of the invaluable pearl that he carries in his hood and a conch shell keeps wailing although it lives in the ocean but unaware of the wealth stored therein.

lines.gurmukhi: cMdn smIp jYsy bwNs inrgMD kMD aulUAY AlK idn idnkr iDAwnI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Chandan Sameep Jaisay Baans Niragandh Kandha , Ulooai Alakh Din Dinakar Dhiaanee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: As a bamboo plant remains bereft of fragrance despite living in the close proximity of a Sandalwood tree, and as an owl keeps his eyes shut during the day behaving ignorantly of the Sun,

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy bwNJ bDU mm sRI gur purK Byt inhcl syNbl ijau haumY AiBmwnI hY ]236]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Baanjh Badhoo Mam Sree Gur Purakh Bhayta , Nihachal Saynbal Jiu Haoumai Abhimaanee Hai ?236?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, because of my ego and pride, I like an infertile woman remained fruitless despite acquiring the touch of True Guru. I am no better than the tall fruitless tree like silk Cotton. (236)
